de.mrapp.android.dialog

Class EditTextDialog.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractMaterialDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
        • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractHeaderDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
          • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractAnimateableDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
            • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractValidateableDialogBuilder<DialogType,BuilderType>
              • de.mrapp.android.dialog.builder.AbstractButtonBarDialogBuilder<EditTextDialog,EditTextDialog.Builder>
                • de.mrapp.android.dialog.EditTextDialog.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    EditTextDialog

    public static class EditTextDialog.Builder
extends AbstractButtonBarDialogBuilder<EditTextDialog,EditTextDialog.Builder>
    A builder, which allows to create and show dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and allow to indicate a running progress. Such a dialog consists of a title, a message and a circular progress bar. Optionally, up to three buttons can be shown.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and contains an EditText widget.
      Builder(android.content.Context context, int themeResourceId)
      Creates a new builder, which allows to create dialogs, which are designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and contains an EditText widget.
